# Draft:Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking

----
| otherlabel3 = Last aired
| otherdata3 =
| Network = Max
}}
Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking is a reality show that features nine teams of pastry chefs and cake artists who craft massive, spellbinding edible showpieces that were inspired by moments and themes from the Harry Potter saga.
The show, hosted by Food Network, features teams of professional chefs; such as Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef, and Harry Potter fans as they create magical dishes by iconic subjects of the series. Hosted by James and Oliver Phelps, the reality show began production in the UK soon, and features special guest stars, including Evanna Lynch, Warwick Davis and Bonnie Wright. It was renewed with second season.
